Package exengine.datamodel

Class Context

java.lang.Object
exengine.datamodel.Context
public class Context extends Object
The Context class represents and bundles the contextual information for explaining a situation. It contains the explainee's role, occurrence, technicality, state, explanation type, explainee's name, and owner's name.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Context(Role explaineeRole, Occurrence occurrence, Technicality explaineeTechnicality, State explaineeState, Integer theExpType)
    Constructs a Context object with the specified explainee role, occurrence, explainee technicality, explainee state, and explanation type.
    Context(Role explaineeRole, Occurrence occurrence, Technicality explaineeTechnicality, State explaineeState, String explaineeName, String ownerName)
    Constructs a Context object with the specified explainee role, occurrence, explainee technicality, explainee state, explainee name, and owner's name.
